1.0.0.name: wordpress/pose-widget
1.0.0.description: The Pose widget allows you to post new style content to your site in real-time with your mobile phone. Pose is a free mobile style app, available at Pose.com, that allows you to create a profile and capture and discover inspiring styles from around the globe. With Pose's widget you can embed your most recent poses directly onto your page. You must have a Pose account to use this widget. Happy Posing!
